Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities

Class RenderObjects

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.utilities.RenderObjects
public class RenderObjects extends Object
The GameObject renderer which loads the images from external files and then render it on the screen.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE and FACTORY Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

  • Constructor Details

    • RenderObjects

      public RenderObjects​(InteractableWorld world, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      Constructor of the RenderObjects, this constructor is intended to read Image into the initialized arraylists
      Parameters:
      world - The current game world InteractableWorld
      g - The current GraphicsContext that the renderer utilizes to render on

  • Method Details

    • renderOnScreen

      public void renderOnScreen()
      Render the objects on the screen, one by one from the WorldElements.

    • drawImg

      public void drawImg​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, GameObject gameObject)
      Render single image on the screen by calling drawImage() provided GraphicsContext.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to be rendered
      gameObject - the Game object that provides the location and size property.

    • drawImg

      public void drawImg​(ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.Image> image, GameObject gameObject, int select)
      Render the image in the ArrayList on the screen by calling drawImage() provided GraphicsContext.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to be rendered
      gameObject - the Game object that provides the location and size property.
      select - The index selection of the image in the ArrayList of Image
